//Generated by BehavEd


affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
{
	set ( "SET_STRING_PACKAGE", "KAM11" );

	task ( "charges" )
	{
		sound ( /*@CHANNELS*/ CHAN_VOICE, "sound/npc/mullins/kam11/03explosives.mp3" );
		set ( "SET_PRINT_TOKEN", "KAM11_004" );
		use ( "charges_objective" );
	}

	dowait ( "charges" );
}
